column4: I uninstalled pidgin, removed it completely with the thing.. synaptic, and when I type "apt-get install pidgin" it just installs the old version I had already installed
how do I install a new version?
and how do I remove what I have in my repositories
You could try the version here, but if you can, find a repository.  http://www.getdeb.net/release.php?id=4509
